model_answer: The correct answer is D: [00:09:06 - 00:09:40]. In this segment, the narrator describes how GPS is used by the military and how it can be accessed by anyone with internet access. They also mention that there are different levels of access to GPS data and cite planefinder.net as an example of a website that tracks commercial planes in real-time using GPS data. The video shows a smartphone with the Department of Defense seal during this portion of the narration.
The segment where a Boeing 777 is overlaid by a cartoon wizard casting a spell with the on-screen “POOF!” is found in option A: [00:05:26 - 00:05:33].
